documentation.text:
@title PriceRelay
 @notice Receives relayed prices from external chains and emits attestable events
 @dev Security-hardened with token binding, monotonicity guards, and deviation checks
 
 This contract enables price feeds from chains not directly supported by FDC's EVMTransaction
 attestation (e.g., Arbitrum, Base, Optimism, Polygon). Authorized relayers fetch prices
 off-chain and relay them here, then FDC attests the relay transaction on Flare.
 
 Security Features:
 - Token binding: Pool tokens are locked on enablePool(), verified on each relay
 - Future timestamp rejection: sourceTimestamp must be <= block.timestamp
 - Monotonicity: sourceBlockNumber must strictly increase
 - Rate limiting: minRelayInterval between relays per pool
 - Deviation check: Rejects price swings > MAX_DEVIATION_BPS (50%)
 - Access control: Only authorized relayers can call relayPrice()
 - Emergency pause: Owner can pause all relay operations
@notice Authorized relayer addresses
@notice Supported source chains
@notice Enabled pools per chain: chainId => poolAddress => enabled
@notice Last relay timestamp per pool
@notice Minimum time between relays (prevents spam)
@notice Maximum age of source data accepted
@notice Maximum price deviation allowed (basis points) - 50%

@notice Allowed source timestamp skew into the future (seconds)
 @dev Different chains can have slight clock drift; allow small skew.
@notice Pool configurations: chainId => poolAddress => config

@notice Emitted when price is relayed - THIS IS WHAT FDC WILL ATTEST
 @dev Contains all data needed for PoolPriceCustomFeed to parse and verify

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => struct PriceRelay.PoolConfig storage ref))

@notice Calculate price deviation in basis points using the *price* implied by sqrtPriceX96.
 @dev Uses FullMath-style mulDiv to avoid overflow when squaring.

@notice Convert sqrtPriceX96 to price (token1/token0) as an integer (Q0).
 @dev price = (sqrtPriceX96^2) / 2^192.

@notice Computes floor(a*b/denominator) with full precision.
 @dev Adapted from Uniswap V3 Core FullMath.mulDiv.

@notice Authorize an address to relay prices
 @param relayer Address to authorize

@notice Revoke relayer authorization
 @param relayer Address to revoke

@notice Enable a source chain for relaying
 @param chainId Chain ID to enable

@notice Disable a source chain
 @param chainId Chain ID to disable

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => struct PriceRelay.PoolConfig storage ref))

with token binding, monotonicity guards, and deviation checks  This contract enables price feeds from chains not directly supported by FDC's EVMTransaction attestation (e.g., Arbitrum, Base, Optimism, Polygon). Authorized relayers fetch prices off-chain and relay them here, then FDC attests the relay transaction on Flare.  Security Features: - Token binding: Pool tokens are locked on enablePool(), verified on each relay - Future timestamp rejection: sourceTimestamp must be <= block.timestamp - Monotonicity: sourceBlockNumber must strictly increase - Rate limiting: minRelayInterval between relays per pool - Deviation check: Rejects price swings > MAX_DEVIATION_BPS (50%) - Access control: Only authorized relayers can call relayPrice() - Emergency pause: Owner can pause all relay operations","events":{"PriceRelayed(uint256,address,uint160,int24,uint128,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"Contains all data needed for PoolPriceCustomFeed to parse and verify"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"authorizeRelayer(address)":{"params":{"relayer":"Address to authorize"}},"canRelay(uint256,address)":{"params":{"chainId":"Source chain ID","pool":"Pool address"},"returns":{"_0":"True if relay is possible"}},"constructor":{"details":"Deployer becomes owner and first authorized relayer","params":{"_maxPriceAge":"Maximum age of source data in seconds","_minRelayInterval":"Minimum seconds between relays for same pool"}},"disableChain(uint256)":{"params":{"chainId":"Chain ID to disable"}},"disablePool(uint256,address)":{"params":{"chainId":"Source chain ID","pool":"Pool address"}},"enableChain(uint256)":{"params":{"chainId":"Chain ID to enable"}},"enablePool(uint256,address,address,address)":{"details":"SECURITY: Token addresses are bound here and verified on every relay","params":{"chainId":"Source chain ID","pool":"Pool address on source chain","token0":"Token0 address (will be bound)","token1":"Token1 address (will be bound)"}},"getPoolConfig(uint256,address)":{"params":{"chainId":"Source chain ID","pool":"Pool address"},"returns":{"_0":"Pool configuration struct"}},"relayPrice(uint256,address,uint160,int24,uint128,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by authorized relayers.
